@EricTopol @MBattegay @FT @jburnmurdoch @mroliverbarnes also nachdem covid 2 jahre lang - davon rund ein halbes jahr lang komplett auf "let it rip" - die vulnerable bevölkerung dezimiert hat, ist das sterberisiko knapp unterhalt einer grippe.

wie lange das so bleibt, wenn man die schädigungen durch reinfektionen miteinbezieht: böh.

@EricTopol @TuurDemeester @FT @jburnmurdoch @mroliverbarnes SocialFi will definitely be the trend of 2022. @RaffKarva @Westegnen @jburnmurdoch @TheLizMullins @EricTopol @FT @mroliverbarnes You shared a pic claiming masks are effective. I shared the original source for the pic which clearly shows the pic flows from a phone survey.
You pointing to ECDC is not a peer reviewed scientific journal, and the studies they cite eg Bangladesh are not statistically significant
@EricTopol Have you considered the mistreatment of patients and the statistical “mistakes”?
@EricTopol @FT @jburnmurdoch @mroliverbarnes Why is no one focusing on the fact that just because you don’t die, even a “mild” case can cause indefinite debilitation via long COVID?
@BenWWeston @EricTopol @FT @jburnmurdoch @mroliverbarnes Also, the US is way less vaccinated than the UK> https://t.co/aULrwZCkHI
